DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To compare pregnancy rate implantation rate embryos select base single Day 3 ( D.3 ) score vs. GES score plus sHLA-G expression .
DOC.brief_title: Pregnancy/Implantation Rates Using Day 3 Score Versus Graduated Embryo Score Plus Biochemical Marker ( sHLA-G )
DOC.detailed_description: Comparing pregnancy rate implantation rate embryos select use common criterion embryo selection day 3 - morphology- ( number blastomere , shape size percentage fragmentation ) v graduate embryo score accumulate 72 hour expression sHLA-G 44-46 hour post fertilization .
DOC.criteria: Self pay ART patient Abnormal uterus Specific Immunologic factor
